column2: Furnished Holiday Home for Rent - Dehiwala
column6: Furnished holiday home for Rent:Two bed rooms furnished holiday home (Ground floor) for your stay for holiday staying, leisure, or medical purpose etc during yours stay in Sri Lanka. One AC room and one Non AC Room, bathroom., secured car park , Very calm and friendly neighborhood. Located in Dehiwala – Nedimala (Colombo city area).The location which is closer to Attidiya Bird Sanctuary, Bellanwila walking and cycling path (https://www.timeout.com/sri-lanka/things-to-do/bellanwila-walking-tracks) , Sri Lanka national ZOO, Dehiwala Junction, Nugegoda, Mountlavinia beach and many other city places. Low traffic way to Gall Road and Low traffic way to reach Colombo-01 within 30 minutes via marine drive. . It’s just few minutes driving distance to very popular Bolgoda Lake tourist area , 20+ tourist friendly restaurants (veg and non-veg) and Pizza Hut, Domino, Subway, KFC, Dinemore, Mc ,and international buffet , and tea and coffee shop , many supermarkets, Many Banks ATM’s and pubs and beachside restaurants.Bed rooms are with double bed size beds, full size mirror, Ceiling fans, Table Lamp, Iron & Ironing table & drawers etc, Kitchen with Refrigerator, Microwave own, Air Fryer, Electric kettle, Bread toaster, Gas Cylinder, Gas cooker, Pantry cupboard, Kitchen sink, Pans, Serving spoons, Kitchen utensils, Plates, Cups, Glasses,.Living area with sofa set, Dining table & Chairs, fan, 32” TV with international PayTV channels and green grass area with pond for clean breath. Bathroom with Hot & Cold water showers, Sanitary Fittings, etc.
